statements: DELETE FROM festival_schedule WHERE performer_id = 1 AND performer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM performer_lineup WHERE performer_id = 100 AND performance_date <= '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM showtimes WHERE showtime >= '2022-10-15 16:00:00' AND performer_id = 200;
DELETE FROM Performers WHERE performer_type = 'Band' AND performance_fee < 1000;
DELETE FROM performer WHERE age > 30 AND comedy_style = 'Stand-up';
DELETE FROM schedule WHERE id = 5 AND performer_id = 3;
